A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is high fantasy. In high fantasy you create a world with its own rules\, but once those rules are set\, the same story telling 101 rules apply. For instance\, a mcguffin or deus ex powers for the convenience of the plot are not good story telling unless established in the canon. Johnson is a good story teller\, so i really don't know what happened here. \n\nA black stain on one of the greatest myths of our time.
